mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MESSAGE ( FROM_UID, TO_UID, CONTENTS) VALUES ( #{from_uid}, (SELECT UID FROM USERS WHERE LOGINID = #{loginid}), #{contents})
mapper.select: SELECT (SELECT LOGINID FROM USERS WHERE UID=M.FROM_UID) AS SENDER, (SELECT LOGINID FROM USERS WHERE UID=M.TO_UID) AS RECEIVER, M.CONTENTS, DATE_FORMAT(M.MDATE,"%Y-%m-%d %T") AS MDATE FROM MESSAGE M WHERE M.MID = #{mid};

SELECT M.MID, (SELECT LOGINID FROM USERS WHERE UID=M.FROM_UID) AS RECEIVERANDSENDER, CONCAT(LEFT(M.CONTENTS, 30),'...') AS CONTENTS, DATE_FORMAT(M.MDATE,"%Y-%m-%d %T") AS MDATE FROM MESSAGE M, USERS U WHERE M.TO_UID = #{to_uid} AND FROM_DEL='N' AND U.UID=M.TO_UID ORDER BY MDATE DESC;

SELECT M.MID, (SELECT LOGINID FROM USERS WHERE UID=M.TO_UID) AS RECEIVERANDSENDER, CONCAT(LEFT(M.CONTENTS, 30),'...') AS CONTENTS, DATE_FORMAT(M.MDATE,"%Y-%m-%d %T") AS MDATE FROM MESSAGE M, USERS U WHERE M.FROM_UID = #{from_uid} AND TO_DEL='N' AND U.UID=M.FROM_UID ORDER BY MDATE DESC;
